/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, teeming with life, stretches out beneath us, flanked by lush green trees on one side and towering buildings on the other. Cars of various colors are scattered across the street, their metallic bodies gleaming under the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly overhead, casting a warm glow over the entire scene.
